# OpenAI

Jupyter AI Agents supports [models](https://platform.openai.com/docs/models#current-model-aliases) from [OpenAI](https://platform.openai.com/docs/overview).


To use OpenAI directly, you'll need to:

1. Get an API key from [OpenAI](https://platform.openai.com)
2. Set up your environment variables:

```bash
export OPENAI_API_KEY="..."
```

Example usage with direct OpenAI integration:

```bash
# Prompt agent example with OpenAI
jupyter-ai-agents prompt \
  --url http://localhost:8888 \
  --token MY_TOKEN \
  --model-provider openai \
  --model-name gpt-4o-mini \
  --path test.ipynb \
  --input "Create a matplotlib example"
```
